description:
The Pre-Order Bonus Pack features a power-up item and an accessory to customize your Survivor on the battlefield! 

Need to escape the Raider? No fear! Use the Android 18 Transphere to borrow a special skill to aid in your escape.

Add to your outfit with the Classic Blue scouter and take on the powerful foe that lies ahead.

Contains:
- Transphere "Android 18"
Skill: Wall Kick
Super Attack: Full Power Energy Blast Volley
- Accessory
Scouter (Blue)
name: DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS - Pre-Order Bonus Pack
